snippet: Mike Birbiglia’s film “Sleepwalk With Me,” which is based on a biographical solo show that he first presented Off Broadway, will open on Friday.
abstract: Mike Birbiglia film Sleepwalk With Me is based on a biographical solo show that he first presented Off Broadway; Birbiglia discusses how failures in his career, like a network television project that never aired, have helped him learn and grow as an entertainer.
lead_paragraph: Mike Birbiglia’s film “Sleepwalk With Me,” which is based on a biographical solo show that he first presented Off Broadway, will open on Friday.

headline.seo: Mike Birbiglia Brings ‘Sleepwalk With Me’ to the Big Screen
headline.main: Failure Is Important (and It Can Also Be Sort of Funny)
headline.print_headline: Failure Is Important (And It Can Also Be Sort of Funny)
